name: Girls Braided Rachel Dress...PDF Sewing Pattern - Sizes 6-16
description:
The Braided Rachel strapless sun dress pattern can be sewn in various knit prints and solids of your choice on your serger. The PDF Pattern and sewing directions offer step-by-step written and visual instructions which will be emailed to you and can be printed off on your home printer.

SEWING LEVEL: 
Intermediate - Sewing directions are for a SERGER only (with some stitches that require a sewing machine)

SEAM ALLOWANCE: 
1/4"

SIZE: 
Girls Size 6-XS, 8-S, 10-M, 12-L, 14-XL, 16-XXL (All sizes are included in PDF pattern)

SUPPLIES NEEDED ONCE PURCHASED Braided Rachel PDF Pattern: 
Serger & Sewing Machine 
1 yard to 1 3/8 yard Knit Fabric 
3/8" Elastic
Matching Thread 
Pins, and Scissors.

This PDF tutorial and PDF pattern has 6 pages of pictures and graphics that explain the process of cutting and sewing your Braided Rachel dress, along with 29, 8 1/2" x 11" printed paper pages that will need to be taped together to use your PDF pattern. The tutorial offers step-by-step directions on attaching your printed pages together, laying PDF pattern out on fabric for cutting, sewing directions, along with measurements, and needed supplies to make dress. PDF pattern and tutorial are emailed out to the email on your purchase information within 24 hours of payment received.

Hope you enjoy and have fun making the Braided Rachel Dress. Thank you for stopping by and happy sewing

name: PDF Hair Srunchie Pattern for Sewing Machines
description:
This great little Hair Scrunchie can be sewn in various fabrics of your choice on your sewing machine. The PDF Pattern and sewing directions offer step-by-step written and visual instructions which will be emailed to you and can be printed off on your home printer.

*This hair scrunchie PDF pattern is also available with directions to sew on a serger instead of a sewing machine. See "PDF Hair Srunchie Pattern for Sergers".

SEWING LEVEL: 
Beginner Sewer

SEAM ALLOWANCE: 
1/2"

SUPPLIES NEEDED TO SEW THIS PDF PATTERN: 
Sewing Machine 
1/4 yard of 45" or 60" wide fabric of your choice 
1/4 inch wide Elastic 7 inches long 
Matching Thread 
Pins and Scissors

name: PDF Pattern Child's Fleece Hat for Sergers
description:
This great little Fleece Hat can be sewn in various fleece prints and solids of your choice on your serger. The PDF Pattern and sewing directions offer step-by-step written and visual instructions which will be emailed to you and can be printed off on your home printer.

*This fleece hat PDF pattern will also be available soon with directions to sew on a serger machine instead of a sewing machine. Coming Soon....."PDF Pattern Child's Fleece Hat for Serger Machines"

This great little Fleece Hat can be sewn in various fleece prints and solids of your choice on your serger. The PDF Pattern and sewing directions offer step-by-step written and visual instructions which will be emailed to you and can be printed off on your home printer.

*This fleece hat PDF pattern will be available soon with directions to sew on a serger instead of a sewing machine. Coming soon.......See "PDF Pattern Child's Fleece Hat for Sergers"

SEWING LEVEL: 
Beginning - Sewing directions are for Sewing Machine only

SEAM ALLOWANCE: 
1/2"

SIZE: 
Child's size (Toddler to Preteens)

SUPPLIES NEEDED ONCE PURCHASING KIT TO MAKE HAT: 
Sewing Machine 
1/4 yard of Fleece Fabric 
Matching Thread 
Pins, and Scissors.
